page.topic: Import Excel file into SQL Table(s)
page.description: Inserts data from an Excel file into a SQL database.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Import Excel file into SQL Table(s)]* tool inserts data from an Excel file into a SQL database. To open the genie, select the Import Excel file into SQL Table(s)... menu command on the Tools menu when the Web Projects Control Panel has focus.

description.p: When you select this command the genie is displayed.
